CustomField.description: The service region. Same formula as defined in the Case, more less, but there's no sector. This drives what addresses get put on templates, contact, etc.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Building__r.BillingCountryCode , "US"),'US' ,
IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(Building__r.BillingCountryCode , "CA"), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Building__r.BillingStateCode, "AB"), ISPICKVAL(Building__r.BillingStateCode, "BC"), ISPICKVAL(Building__r.BillingStateCode, "SK"), ISPICKVAL(Building__r.BillingStateCode, "NT"), ISPICKVAL(Building__r.BillingStateCode, "YT"), ISPICKVAL(Building__r.BillingStateCode, "NU"), ISPICKVAL(Building__r.BillingStateCode, "MB") ) ), 'Western Canada' , 'Eastern Canada' ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The region the customer's Warranty is run out of.
CustomField.label: Warranty Service Region
